Major_Arcs.title: Circus Arrives in Town
Major_Arcs.description: This major arc introduces the arrival of a circus, focusing on Paul Bunyan's role as a strongman and the public's initial reaction to the circus spectacle.

sub_scenes.title: Circus Spectacle and Public Reaction
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene showcases Paul Bunyan's circus act and the excitement generated among the townspeople upon the circus's arrival, highlighting the wonder and novelty of the circus entertainment.

Major_Arcs.title: Circus Intrigue and Danger
Major_Arcs.description: This major arc shifts the tone to introduce conflict and danger within the circus setting, focusing on an intervention, an attack, and the backstory of a disgruntled former performer.

sub_scenes.title: Initial Conflict at the Circus
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene depicts a man's intervention in a threatening situation involving Billings, leading to a violent escalation with a pistol and setting a dangerous tone.

narrative_arcs.title: Escalating Threat with a Pistol and Injury

sub_scenes.title: Job Offer and Backstory
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene provides exposition about Matto Grasso and presents Paul Bunyan with a job offer, setting up future conflicts and Paul Bunyan's role in the circus.

narrative_arcs.title: Explanation of Matto Grasso and Invitation to the Circus
Job Offer as the New Strong Man

sub_scenes.title: Matto Grasso's Revenge
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene details Matto Grasso's vengeful plot against Paul Bunyan, escalating from envy to arson, leading to a direct confrontation within the circus arena.

narrative_arcs.title: Paul Bunyan's Circus Performance and Matto Grasso's Envy
Circus Tent Fire and Paul Bunyan's Intervention

Major_Arcs.title: Chaos in the Circus
Major_Arcs.description: This major arc depicts the escalating chaos caused by Matto Grasso as he releases a dangerous ape and engages in a chase with circus personnel, intensifying the conflict within the circus grounds.

sub_scenes.title: Gigantico and the Chase
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene shows Matto Grasso unleashing Gigantico, leading to the ape's escape and initiating a pursuit by a circus guard and Paul Bunyan, increasing the level of danger and disorder.

narrative_arcs.title: Matto Grasso's New Foul Deed: Releasing Gigantico
Gigantico Escapes and the Pursuit Begins

sub_scenes.title: Continued Chaos and Attacks
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene follows Matto Grasso's flight into the arena and his continued assaults on the pursuing guard using weights and a hatchet, highlighting his desperation and the ongoing chaos.

Major_Arcs.title: Paul Bunyan's Second Chance
Major_Arcs.description: This major arc shifts focus to a new strongman act, unexpectedly performed by Paul Bunyan, and his subsequent decision regarding a job offer, showcasing his strength and eventual choice.

sub_scenes.title: Unexpected Performance
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene depicts a spontaneous strongman act performed by Paul Bunyan, mistaken by onlookers as part of the circus, showcasing his incredible strength in a public spectacle.

sub_scenes.title: Job Offer and Departure
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene concludes Paul Bunyan's circus episode with a job offer, which he ultimately declines, choosing to return to his life in the North Woods, resolving his brief involvement with the circus.

narrative_arcs.title: Job Offer and North Woods Rejection

Major_Arcs.title: Marco Polo's Journey
Major_Arcs.description: This major arc initiates Marco Polo's adventurous journey, starting with encounters in Tibet and a mysterious severed head, setting the stage for a series of fantastical quests and discoveries.

sub_scenes.title: Initial Encounters
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene introduces Marco Polo facing the Ogress of Tibet and then shifts to a man's horrifying discovery of a severed talking head in a forest, beginning a sequence of strange events.

narrative_arcs.title: Marco Polo and the Ogress of Tibet
Discovery of the Severed Talking Head
The Severed Head's Plea for Help

sub_scenes.title: Journey and Mourning
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene follows Marco Polo's rescue of a tied man who gifts him a magic dagger and his subsequent arrival at a city in deep mourning, setting up new quests and mysteries.

narrative_arcs.title: Marco Polo Rescues a Tied Man and Receives a Magic Dagger

Major_Arcs.title: Ogress of Tibet
Major_Arcs.description: This major arc details Marco Polo's encounter with the Ogress of Tibet, from meeting her in disguise to being trapped and fighting monstrous rats in her castle.

sub_scenes.title: Deceptive Encounter
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene introduces Marco Polo's meeting with the King of Hi-toun and his offer to help find Princess Lotus, leading to an encounter with a seemingly distressed woman who lures him into a trap.

narrative_arcs.title: Marco Polo Meets the King of Hi-toun and Learns of Princess Lotus's Disappearance
The Woman in Distress and the Witch's Castle

sub_scenes.title: Confrontation with the Ogress
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene reveals the woman's true identity as the Ogress of Tibet, trapping Marco Polo in her castle and forcing him into combat with monstrous rats to escape.

narrative_arcs.title: Entering the Castle and the Ogress's Trap
Combat with Monstrous Rats and Defiance Against the Ogress

Major_Arcs.title: Ogre's Captivity and Escape
Major_Arcs.description: This major arc shifts to a new narrative thread involving a swordsman captured by an ogre, detailing his imprisonment and eventual escape using a hidden magic blade.

sub_scenes.title: Ogre's Trap
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene depicts a swordsman's encounter with a cloaked villain and an ogre, leading to his capture and imprisonment by the ogre.

sub_scenes.title: Escape with Magic Blade
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene focuses on the bound man's desperate situation in the ogre's dungeon and his resourceful use of a hidden magic blade to escape captivity.

Major_Arcs.title: Return and Farewell
Major_Arcs.description: This major arc concludes the story of the rescued man and woman, detailing their return to her father and the man's decision to refuse a reward of marriage, choosing adventure instead.

sub_scenes.title: Reunion and Departure
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene depicts the journey back, arrival at the father's kingdom, and the man's polite refusal of marriage, opting for his adventurous life, thus resolving their immediate storyline.

narrative_arcs.title: Dungeon Escape and Journey to the Father

Major_Arcs.title: Treasure of Agra
Major_Arcs.description: This major arc introduces a new story about a hidden treasure, focusing on a prisoner's desperate bargain for freedom by revealing the treasure's location to a captain and the subsequent betrayal and revenge.

sub_scenes.title: The Story Begins
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene sets up the treasure narrative with a Treasure Keeper's introduction and transitions to a penal colony where a prisoner seeks to make a deal for freedom.

sub_scenes.title: The Deal for Treasure
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene details the prisoner's desperate plea to Captain Brooking, revealing the treasure of Agra and striking a deal for escape in exchange for the treasure map.

narrative_arcs.title: The Map and the Escape Agreement

Major_Arcs.title: Betrayal and Revenge
Major_Arcs.description: This major arc focuses on the Captain's betrayal, the prisoner's long-awaited revenge, and the confrontation that ensues years after the initial treachery.

sub_scenes.title: Betrayal Unfolds
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene reveals Captain Brooking's betrayal and escape with the treasure, focusing on the reactions of his subordinates and the lieutenant's vow of revenge.

narrative_arcs.title: Realization of Betrayal and Captain's Escape
Furious Denial and Vow of Revenge
Years Later: Release and Return to England

sub_scenes.title: Confrontation and Deception
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene depicts Jordan's patient vigil and confrontation with Captain Brooking, leading to Brooking's deceptive invitation to his home under the guise of sharing the treasure.

narrative_arcs.title: Jordan's Vigil and Brooking's Unaware Planning

Major_Arcs.title: Final Confrontation and Justice
Major_Arcs.description: This major arc culminates in the final confrontation between Jordan and Captain Brooking, leading to a violent struggle, Brooking's downfall, and the arrival of the police.

sub_scenes.title: The Trap and Fight
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene features Brooking leading Jordan to the attic, revealing his plan to kill him, and the ensuing fight where Jordan ultimately shoots Brooking in self-defense.

narrative_arcs.title: Journey to the Attic and Betrayal

sub_scenes.title: Aftermath and Moral
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene details the police arriving at the scene, Brooking's desperate escape attempt, and concludes with a narrator delivering a moral message about the perils of money.

narrative_arcs.title: Police Respond to Gunshot and Find Wounded Man
Police Observation and Call for Homicide Squad

Major_Arcs.title: Dr. Styx and the Haunted Estate
Major_Arcs.description: This major arc introduces Dr. Styx and his investigation into a haunted estate, detailing his consultation, arrival at the estate, confrontation with a ghost, and overcoming a ghostly attack.

sub_scenes.title: Introduction and Premise
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene introduces Dr. Styx and Vincent Matthews' sentencing, setting up the premise for a supernatural investigation into the Matthews estate.

sub_scenes.title: Seeking Help and Ominous Warning
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene features Henry Northrup seeking Dr. Styx's expertise for the haunted Matthews estate and their arrival at the estate, where they receive a dire warning.

narrative_arcs.title: Arrival and Ominous Warning at Matthews Estate

sub_scenes.title: Entering the Haunted House
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene shows Dr. Styx disregarding the warning and entering the haunted Matthews estate, where he is immediately confronted by the ghost of Vincent Matthews.

narrative_arcs.title: Disregarding the Warning and Entering the Haunted House

sub_scenes.title: Ghostly Combat and Escape
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene depicts the physical confrontation between Dr. Styx and Vincent Matthews' ghost, where Dr. Styx initially struggles but ultimately escapes, revealing the ghost's unexpected vulnerability.

Major_Arcs.title: Rosalind's Forgiveness
Major_Arcs.description: This major arc explores themes of violence, fear, and redemption, focusing on a seated man seeking salvation through forgiveness from his murdered sister, Rosalind.

sub_scenes.title: Seeking Redemption
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene introduces a cloaked man confronting a seated man about his violent past, leading to the revelation that forgiveness from his murdered sister is his only path to salvation.

narrative_arcs.title: Admission of Fear and Search for Salvation
The Sister's Forgiveness and Murder Revelation

sub_scenes.title: Forced Encounter and Summons
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene depicts the cloaked man forcibly making the man in white confront Rosalind's spirit, summoning her to appear and potentially offer forgiveness.

narrative_arcs.title: Summoning of Rosalind and Her Arrival

sub_scenes.title: Forgiveness and Love
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene culminates in Rosalind's forgiveness and expression of brotherly love, freeing Vincent from his torment, and leading to a peaceful resolution.

narrative_arcs.title: Request for Forgiveness and its Granting

sub_scenes.title: Resolution and Departure
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene shows Vincent's remorse, Rosalind's reassurance, their departure, and the cloaked man's return to normalcy, concluding the supernatural encounter at the Matthews estate.

narrative_arcs.title: Return to the House and Explanation

Major_Arcs.title: Hudson's Voyages
Major_Arcs.description: This major arc chronicles Henry Hudson's voyages in search of the Northwest Passage, from initial optimism and company support to eventual mutiny and tragic fate.

sub_scenes.title: First Voyage Preparation
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene introduces Henry Hudson and the Dutch East India Company's proposition for him to find the Northwest Passage, setting up his first voyage.

narrative_arcs.title: The Mysterious Fate of Henry Hudson
The Dutch East India Company's Proposition

sub_scenes.title: First Voyage and Return
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene follows Hudson's first voyage, from initial hope and exploration of the Hudson River to disappointment and return to Holland after failing to find the passage.

narrative_arcs.title: Weeks at Sea and Talk of Mutiny
Entering the Hudson River with Hope
Hudson's Reflection and Decision to Return Home

sub_scenes.title: Second Voyage and Ice Trap
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene initiates Hudson's second voyage and quickly turns dire as his ship becomes trapped in ice, leading to a harsh winter and growing tensions among the crew.

narrative_arcs.title: Another Voyage for the Northern Passage
Trapped in Ice and Winter Quarters
The Ice Melts and Disagreement on Course

sub_scenes.title: Mutiny and Fate
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene depicts the eruption of mutiny against Hudson, his being cast adrift by the crew, and the mutineers facing justice upon their return, culminating in Hudson's tragic end.

Major_Arcs.title: Arabian Knight's Rescue
Major_Arcs.description: This major arc introduces the Arabian Knight, Hassan, and his mission to rescue a kidnapped princess from Tartar horsemen, detailing his journey, infiltration, and confrontation.

sub_scenes.title: The Mission Briefing
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene introduces Hassan and his summoning by the Caliph, who tasks him with rescuing the kidnapped daughter of Ali-Ben-Ali from the Tartar leader Kurgan.

sub_scenes.title: Journey to the Oasis and Warnings
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene follows Hassan's journey to the oasis of El Sholem, where he encounters signs of Tartar presence and receives warnings about the dangers ahead.

narrative_arcs.title: Setting off to Confront the Tartars
Warning and Revelation at the Oasis

sub_scenes.title: Infiltration and Discovery
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene details Hassan's stealthy infiltration of the Tartar camp, neutralizing a sentry and overhearing crucial information about the captive princess.

sub_scenes.title: Contact and Confrontation
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene depicts Hassan making contact with the princess, but their interaction is quickly interrupted by Tartar guards, leading to a physical confrontation.

Major_Arcs.title: Duel for Freedom
Major_Arcs.description: This major arc centers around Hassan's duel against Kurgan's warriors, a trial by combat proposed by Kurgan as a 'chance' for Hassan to earn the princess's freedom.

sub_scenes.title: Duel Negotiation
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene details Hassan's interrogation by Kurgan, the proposition of a duel, and the negotiation of terms for victory, setting the stage for the upcoming combat.

sub_scenes.title: Duel Begins and First Opponent
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene depicts the commencement of the duel, Hassan's unconventional strategy using dirt, and his swift defeat of the first Tartar warrior.

narrative_arcs.title: Swift Defeat of the First Opponent

sub_scenes.title: Second Opponent and Resolution
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene showcases Hassan's intense fight with the second warrior, including a reversal of fortune, a plea for mercy, and ultimately Kurgan honoring his word despite Hassan's apparent defeat.

Major_Arcs.title: Reward and Romance
Major_Arcs.description: This major arc concludes Hassan's rescue mission and adds a romantic dimension, focusing on the aftermath of the duel, the princess's explanation, and the budding romance between Hassan and the princess.

sub_scenes.title: Aftermath and Romance
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene wraps up the Arabian Knight's narrative with Kurgan honoring his promise, the princess clarifying her previous actions, and a hint of romance developing between her and Hassan before their departure.
